title.rendered: The Most Secure & Private Android Photo Vault App

content.rendered:
Cover is the one of the most powerful photo & video vault apps available on the Google Play Store. It’s also one of the most secure & private thanks to the security measures in the app. 

Cover’s Privacy Features

Cover is packed with security features that aren’t available in most standard photo vault apps, such as:

  • End-to-end Encryption: Cover is completely encrypted. Meaning, the only person with access to the app and it’s contents is you, and only you.
  • 24/7 Device Scanning for Explicit Photos: Cover is the only photo vault app that constantly scans your phone or tablet for stored or incoming explicit content. If detected, Cover will immediately store it to your private gallery.
  • Smart Notifications: If explicit photos or videos are detected, you’ll receive a notification. These notifications are subtle and non-intrusive.
  • Messaging Protection: You’ll never have to look at an unsolicited d*ck pic or explicit photo again with Cover’s messaging protection. Cover will immediately detect the photo and block it before you see it.
  • Strong Passcodes: You’ll have the option of creating a unique strong passcode in order to open the app and use Cover.
  • Constant Updates: We work around the clock to ensure Cover is updated with the top security measures and brand new features.
  • Active Support Team: Our support team is here for you all the time. We do our best to make sure every support ticket or question is answered as soon as possible.
  • No Internet Access required: You don’t need Wi-Fi to use Cover. Just download the app off of the Google Play store and let it work it’s magic immediately.

These are all great security measures deliberately built into Cover to ensure your device stays clean, and most importantly, secure. We’re constantly working to release new features and bug fixes, so you can rest assured we have your best interest and security at heart!

Password Protected

One of the smartest things you can do to protect your Android device is to set a strong password. With Cover, you have the option to lock your photo vault with a strong numerical passcode or a fingerprint lock. It’s one of the most sophisticated ways to keep the app completely secure and only available for you to use.

Download Cover Now!

If you want more information about how to protect your device in general, check out our article, “7 Easy Ways to Increase Your Android Phone’s Privacy.”
